Enable mic to give voice input: Yarda mic don bada shigarwar murya
Enable speech output only for speech inp: Yi amfani da bayanan jawabin kawai don maganganun magana
Enable speech output regardless of input: Yarda da fitarwa ta fice ko da kuwa irin nau'in shigarwa
Add address to connect to Hardware: Ƙara adireshin don haɗi zuwa Hardware
Please login again to change SUSI server: Da fatan a sake shiga don canza SUSI uwar garken
Reset the speed at which the text is spo: Sake saita gudun da aka yi rubutu zuwa al'ada
Reset the pitch at which the text is spo: Sake saita filin da aka yi rubutu zuwa tsoho
Play a short demonstration of speech syn: Play wani ɗan gajeren zanga-zangar magana
Please enter a valid URL first: Da fatan a shigar da adireshin mai amfani a farko
Please verify that Susi Hardware is runn: Da fatan a tabbatar cewa Susi Hardware yana gudana a adireshin da aka ambata
Login Failed. Try Again: Shiga Ba a yi nasarar ba. Gwada kuma
Some error occurred. Try Again: Wasu kuskure sun faru. Gwada kuma
Please check your internet connection: Da fatan a duba haɗin Intanit ɗinku
Enter a valid Email Address: Shigar da adireshin Imel mai aiki
Email already taken. Please try with ano: Imel ɗin da aka riga aka dauka. Da fatan a gwada tare da wani imel.
If you have an Account Please Login: Idan kana da Asusun Don Allah a shiga
Invalid Credentials. Please check your E: Abubuwan da ba a sani ba. Da fatan a duba Email ko Password.
Da fatan a sake sake shiga.
Failed. Try Again: Ba a yi nasarar ba. Gwada kuma
Expand your experience get closer and st: Ƙara sanin kwarewarka kusa da zama a halin yanzu
We will text a verification code to this: Za mu rubuta lambar tabbatarwa zuwa wannan lambar. Kudi na SMS na iya amfani.

Tweet about SUSI on Twitter: Talla game da SUSI akan Twitter
